node.title: This is what we know about William Tyrrell case
node.alt: A boy wearing a Spider-Man suit.
node.description: For seven years, the case of the missing boy dressed in a Spider-Man costume has confounded the state's top detectives â€” this week, there is renewed hope of a resolution.
node.content:
["For seven years, the case of the missing boy dressed in a Spider-Man costume has confounded the state's top detectives.", "Three-year-old William Tyrrell appeared to have vanished without a trace from his foster grandmother's house at Kendall on the NSW Mid-North Coast.", "Search teams scoured bush nearby while detectives questioned anyone who may have seen anything.", "At one stage, there were about 600 persons of interest.\u00a0\u00a0", "But despite the years of investigations, and a $1 million reward for information, no-one has been arrested.", "", "
NSW Police unveil details around renewed search for William Tyrrell.(ABC News)
", "This week, police revealed they were\u00a0conducting new searches at three sites that had not been scoured before, and\u00a0that they had identified a new person of interest in the investigation.", "And, for the first time, police confirmed that they were now looking for the \"remains\" of William Tyrrell and that any hope of finding of him alive had been abandoned.", "
The disappearance
", "", "
William Tyrrell's foster grandmother's house in Kendall.(ABC News: Jessica Kidd)
", "William Tyrrell was last seen about\u00a010:30am on September 12, 2014, playing a game with his older sister on the lawn of his foster grandmother's home in Kendall.", "His foster mother, who was sitting watching them, went inside to make a cup of tea.", "She became concerned when she realised she hadn't heard anything from William for five minutes and began searching the house and the front and back yard.", "A short time later, William Tyrrell's foster father arrived back from Lakewood, a 10-minute drive away, where he had gone in search of a better internet connection for a work conference call.", "He joined in the search and started knocking on the doors of neighbours.", "Just before 11am, the foster mother called triple-0\u00a0to report William missing.", "
The search
", "", "
Hundreds of police and volunteers joined the search for the missing boy.(ABC News: Luisa Rubbo)
", "Hundreds of police, SES volunteers and members of the public joined a search of the rugged bushland surrounding the house, which continued around the clock.", "Police divers were brought in to check nearby waterways and dams.", "Investigations began into two cars seen parked near the house that morning.", "As part of the inquiry, police interviewed registered sex offenders living in the Kendall area.", "
Former detective Gary Jubelin
", "", "
Former police detective Gary Jubelin was placed in charge of the investigation.(AAP: Joel Carrett)
", "Five months later, high-profile detective Gary Jubelin was put in charge of the case.", "He'd previously led the investigations in the murders of three children in Bowraville and the disappearance of Sydney man Matthew Leveson.", "He was removed from the Tyrrell investigation in 2019 following allegations of misconduct.", "He resigned from the police force a short time later.", "In April last year, the former detective was convicted of illegally recording \u00a0four telephone conversations with a person of interest in the\u00a0Tyrrell case and fined $10,000.", "
The inquest
", "", "
Police vowed not to give up on the search for William Tyrrell.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "In March 2019, a coronial inquest began into the boy's disappearance.", "Deputy state coroner Harriet Grahame heard evidence from William Tyrrell's birth parents and foster family as well as information gathered by police with the aim of determining what happened to him.", "The inquest was interrupted by the pandemic and eventually concluded on October 8.", "The coroner has yet to deliver her findings.", "
Fresh searches\u00a0
", "", "
Police conducted more searches in the Kendall area last year.\u00a0(ABC News: Luisa Rubbo)
", "In June last year, police conducted a four-day search of bushland at Herons Creek, a 10-minute drive from the house at Kendall.", "Investigators appeared to be focused on an area near an old saw mill where a convicted paedophile Frank Abbott was living in a caravan at the time of the boy's disappearance.", "Police and SES volunteers also spent hours cutting back thick undergrowth next to an old train line nearby\u00a0", "The inquest had heard from neighbours that 79-year-old Abbott became obsessed with the Tyrrell case and spoke about noticing an odd smell. \u00a0", "
The latest search
", "", "
NSW Police search around the home of William Tyrrell's foster grandmother.
", "To mark what would have have been William Tyrrell's 10th birthday in June this year, \u00a0police made a fresh appeal for information, vowing to leave \"no stone unturned\" in the search for the missing boy.", "The detective heading the investigation, said police would never give up in the search for William.", "Then on Monday, in an apparent breakthrough, police announced that they were returning to Kendall to carry out fresh searches at three locations close to the house where William was last seen.", "This morning, officers began searching an area directly beneath a second-storey balcony at the foster grandmother's house.", "They also searched an area of bushland around 1km\u00a0from the house.", "NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller revealed officers had identified a new person of interest.", "Police also confirmed that rather than looking for clues, the search was now looking for Tyrrell's\u00a0\"remains\".", "\"It's highly likely that if we found something, it would be a body,\" Detective Chief Superintendent\u00a0Darren Bennett."]
